There are quite a few things in life that bore me. Sean Penn every time he opens his mouth, anti-vaxxers, Harry and Meghan tolerance is not my middle name.
But the 80th Golden Globes took boredom do… [+9040 chars]

articles.author: Jake Massey
articles.title: The Banshees of Inisherin cleaned up at the Golden Globes and was an absolute masterclass - LADbible
articles.description: The dark comedy picked up numerous awards, and rightly so. Martin McDonagh, Brendan Gleeson and Colin Farrell make a magical trio.
articles.content:
The Banshees of Inisherin won big at the Golden Globes last night - and deservedly so.
The dark comedy won the best comedy or musical award, while writer and director Martin McDonagh took home best … [+2990 chars]
